comment.body: You you please add a search engine to the sites list? I can't even go through 0list to find anything as my PC lags after click 'more' or whatever the button is called.
Can there be an option to _not_ subscribe to things I comment on? I'd like to manually subscribe to things myself.
Will you be able to remove the auto-follow feature? I hate commenting on stuff, only to follow it. It makes me never want to comment.
